Features

Everything you need

A complete toolkit for understanding and improving your estate plan.

Gap Analysis

Identify missing documents, outdated provisions, and potential issues in your current plan.

Asset Distribution

Visualize how your assets will be distributed across beneficiaries.

Document Drafts

Generate customized legal documents tailored to your state's requirements.

Review Reminders

Get notified when life events require updates to your estate plan.

Beneficiary Tracking

Catch conflicts between your will and direct beneficiary designations.

State-Specific

Recommendations based on your state's unique laws and requirements.

Process

How it works

Four simple steps to a comprehensive estate plan analysis.

1

Answer questions

Tell us about your family, assets, and estate planning goals.

2

Get your analysis

We identify gaps, conflicts, and potential issues in your plan.

3

Review distribution

See exactly how your assets will flow to beneficiaries.

4

Generate documents

Create draft documents tailored to your state's laws.

Comprehensive Coverage

Every aspect of your estate, analyzed

From wills to trusts, guardianship to asset planningâ€”our AI understands the full picture of your estate.

Wills

Create and analyze your will with AI precision

Our AI reviews your will for completeness, identifies potential issues, and ensures your wishes are clearly expressed and legally sound.

  • Automatic clause analysis
  • Beneficiary conflict detection
  • State law compliance check
  • Plain language translation
Trusts

Understand and optimize your trust structure

Whether you have a revocable living trust, irrevocable trust, or special needs trust, we analyze every provision and suggest improvements.

  • Trust type identification
  • Successor trustee review
  • Distribution schedule analysis
  • Tax optimization suggestions
Guardianship

Protect your children's future

Ensure your minor children are cared for by people you trust. We help you think through guardianship decisions and document them properly.

  • Guardian nomination review
  • Backup guardian planning
  • Special needs considerations
  • Financial guardian separation
Assets

Comprehensive asset inventory and planning

Track all your assets in one place. Our system identifies what's covered by your estate plan and what might pass outside of it.

  • Real estate tracking
  • Financial account analysis
  • Beneficiary designation review
  • Digital asset planning

Private. Secure. Protected.

Your estate documents contain your most sensitive information. We treat them that way.

Bank-Level Encryption

Your documents are encrypted at rest and in transit with AES-256 encryption.

SOC 2 Type II Certified

Independently audited security controls.

No Data Training

Your documents are never used to train AI models.

Private Infrastructure

Dedicated processing with no shared resources. Your data stays in your region.

Access Controls

Granular permissions for family members and advisors.
